page.title: 10A Girl's Home & School Life
page.content:
On Wednesday morning I got up at 8 o' clock in the morning. I got up and had my breakfast, and after it, I went to the bathroom,and had a wash then I got my swimming kit ready.Then did my hair then I did my teeth and got my coat and I put my stuff In my bag.And put my shoes on then went to call for Nicola and Sarah.
When we got to school we had to wait for the whistle to go. When it had gone we all lined up to go into school. When we got in I hung up my coat and bags. We cleaned out the guinea-pigs.Then I went to Mrs Pleasants group. Where we talked about area in maths.
by Jo-anne Wankling age 9
